author: wsanchez
msg: Add support for Mac OS (versions 10.0 and greater), using macro MAC_OS.

author: wsanchez
msg: Use macro "HAVE_DYLD" instead of "RHAPSODY" for dyld-specific code.
Add macro "DYLD_CANT_UNLOAD" around workaround for dyld-unloading-is-a-noop.

author: wsanchez
msg: On Mac OS, say "Mac OS", not "Unix".

author: wsanchez
msg: Rename Rhapsody layout to Mac OS X Server.
Set install locations to those appropriate for custom user built Apache.
